I made this extension because I try to be more conscious about not clicking on distractions as they pop up while working â€“ on your computer, on your phone, or around you! 

When you catch yourself seeing a distraction, then choosing to not go that time-wasting wormhole, or catch yourself in a wormhole then snap out of it, click the extension icon to reward yourself! 

It will tally escaped wormholes for the day, and reset to zero at 4am every day! The higher your score, the more time you saved that day! Happy productivity! Share it with a friend!
